snippet: Demonstrations on the Supreme Court’s grounds have long been banned, but the high court responded to a judgment narrowing that ban with a new regulation.
abstract: Demonstrations on the Supreme Court’s grounds have long been banned, but the high court responded to a judgment narrowing that ban with a new regulation.

headline.main: Supreme Court Issues New Rule Barring Protests on Plaza
headline.print_headline: Supreme Court Tightens Regulations On Protests
